pullRequest.title: issue #977 remove derby config from bulkdata.xml

commit.message:
issue #977 remove derby config from bulkdata.xml

Signed-off-by: Albert Wang <xuwang@us.ibm.com>

issue #977 update comments

Signed-off-by: Albert Wang <xuwang@us.ibm.com>

nodes.bodyText: so it doesn't complain that fhirbatchDS doesn't exist by default?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -41,15 +44,21 @@
             portNumber="50001"
             securityMechanism="15"
             serverName="${env.BATCH_DB_HOSTNAME}"
-            sslConnection="true" /> -->
-        <!-- <properties.postgresql
+            sslConnection="true" />
+    </dataSource>
+     -->
+   
+   <!-- Use postgresql for job repository  
+    <dataSource id="fhirbatchDS" jndiName="jdbc/fhirbatchDB">
+        <jdbcDriver libraryRef="fhirSharedLib"/>
+        <properties.postgresql
             databaseName="jobdb"
             portNumber="5432"
             serverName="localhost"
             user="javabatch"
-            password="change-password" /> -->
-        <properties.derby.embedded createDatabase="create" databaseName="derby/fhirDB"/>
+            password="change-password" />
     </dataSource>
+    -->
 
     <batchPersistence jobStoreRef="BatchDatabaseStore"/>
     <databaseStore dataSourceRef="fhirbatchDS" id="BatchDatabaseStore" schema="JBATCH" tablePrefix=""/>
